tXhB1YEtxrzarLhO6.name: Armor Familiarity (@Skill@)
tXhB1YEtxrzarLhO6.notes: Let you ignore one encumbrance level

tWZ0sMg4yRBatNaVS.name: Biting Mastery
tWZ0sMg4yRBatNaVS.notes: Let you use Karate skill when biting

tU8574DkPhyM06wgy.name: Code of Honor (Bushido)
tU8574DkPhyM06wgy.notes: Loyalty to master.  Death before failure. Ritual suicide if ordered. Face any challenge or insult to your lord. Face everything stoicly. Never overlook disrespect.

tCU5BsZxzEnnFu3DA.name: Code of Honor (Xia)
tCU5BsZxzEnnFu3DA.notes: Be skilled at arms. Honor your word. Be humble and brave. Uphold justice. Use force as needed but with restraint. Respect your teacher.

tsDDZppnYAulshGbo.name: Cotton Stomach
tsDDZppnYAulshGbo.notes: Lets you catch attacker's incoming hand or feed with your abdominal muscles

t0pN-dXQaOm0VF1d_.name: Delusion (@Belief@)
t0pN-dXQaOm0VF1d_.notes: Take a risky action in combat

tvd0z3PWH1Y-YtHtl.name: Drunken Fighting
tvd0z3PWH1Y-YtHtl.notes: Let you fight effectively when intoxicated

t_RL6xlkxSHm6IR0a.name: Exotic Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
t_RL6xlkxSHm6IR0a.notes: Lets you ignore built-in penalties for a particular weapon

tZ42_NoxnXNS0wkc6.name: Form Mastery (@Weapon@)
tZ42_NoxnXNS0wkc6.notes: Let you switch skill at any time

tGjHBhOER5sffBa1W.name: Grip Mastery (@Weapon@)
tGjHBhOER5sffBa1W.notes: Lets you change grip as a free action

tNTm_W2o0SKyYaHfb.name: Ground Guard
tNTm_W2o0SKyYaHfb.notes: +1 to quick contests when lying down

t9H_Ns0Ro-dbraHx0.name: Improvised Weapons (@Weapon@)
t9H_Ns0Ro-dbraHx0.notes: Ignore skill penalties when wielding an improvised weapon

tcS7RcczdamsT97uU.name: Iron Arms
tcS7RcczdamsT97uU.notes: May add up to 2 levels, granting up to 2 DR to arms OR Striker (manually add striker and increase cost by 4 points)

features.situation: to ST and HT to resist injury from Arm Lock, Wrench Arm and similar techniques

tFZ9YkAw0OmP3Fwz1.name: Iron Hands
tFZ9YkAw0OmP3Fwz1.notes:
May add 1 level, granting an additional DR to hands
May also purchase Blunt Claws for 3 points

tEoDd9imTHEjsxNjL.name: Iron Legs
tEoDd9imTHEjsxNjL.notes: May add up to 2 levels, granting up to 2 DR to legs

features.situation: to ST and HT to resist injury from Leg Lock, Wrench Leg and similar techniques

tW8rKbT3dzR98R8HW.name: Iron Neck
tW8rKbT3dzR98R8HW.notes: May add up to 2 levels, granting up to 2 DR to neck

features.situation: to ST and HT to resist injury from chokes, strangles, and Neck Snaps

trqViJVRMuP9KsNcI.name: Naval Training
trqViJVRMuP9KsNcI.notes: You may ignore -2 to attacks and -1 to defend from bad footing due to naval vessels movement.

t1XMSS8l-YwmEWIIr.name: Neck Control (@Striking Skill@)
t1XMSS8l-YwmEWIIr.notes: +1 to hit head, neck or torso in a clinch

tITBtMX-YfA6RnzdX.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
tITBtMX-YfA6RnzdX.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

ttt961hFIHFk8QbAM.name: Power Grappling
ttt961hFIHFk8QbAM.notes: You may base DX-based grappling rolls on ST

tjInaW-wKYILbF0-T.name: Rapid Retraction (@Kick or Punch@)
tjInaW-wKYILbF0-T.notes: +1 to avoid Arm Lock or Leg Grapple after been parried

features.situation: opponent's defense roll against @Signature Move allowing Defense Roll@ when recognized.

twqQpveqPpnS9szSJ.name: Reputation (@Signature Move as a Quick Contest@)

features.situation: on quick contests for @Signature Move as a Quick Contest@ when recognized.

tTWVI1ZnjqGCxQhpt.notes: Lets you learn traits belonging to other schools.

taXKJRgeWwYubq5_y.name: Shield-Wall Training
taXKJRgeWwYubq5_y.notes: You may block attacks on an ally beside you and ignore attack penalty for large shields

tHAfA2lKnn4OT6QIN.name: Strongbow
tHAfA2lKnn4OT6QIN.notes: Let you ignore some penalties when shooting a bow too strong for you

tFY8Qo15JlMsaJxvx.name: Style Adaptation (@Styles@)
tFY8Qo15JlMsaJxvx.notes: Lets you learn techniques belonging to other styles

thQKsv-TBtYLAPq2g.name: Suit Familiarity (@Suit Skill@)

m3tl4tJVP4u30u5rH.notes: Those you serve with or command

meNxU0K48gpMICPpB.name: Alternate Benefit
meNxU0K48gpMICPpB.notes: Reduce chance of impersonal battlefield hazards

mgdkgAm-jWuJEc5cs.name: Alternate Benefit

mbHfc3pG4pVoprm0N.name: Alternate Benefit

tM4AdANU2XBdIaK_K.name: Technique Adaptation (@Technique@)
